title: Sophia Anne Caruso and Sofia Wylie Discuss ‘The School for Good and Evil’
description: Sophia Anne Caruso, 21, and Sofia Wylie, 18, are both making their feature film lead debuts in the new Netflix adaptation of Soman Chainani’s young adult fantasy series.
dc:creator: Sarah Bahr
category: The School for Good and Evil (Movie)
media:credit: Amanda Hakan for The New York Times
media:description: Sofia Wylie, left, with Sophia Anne Caruso in Los Angeles.
